name: FadingStickyHeader
desc: The scene that briefly keeps a header at the top of the screen as the user scrolls through the article.

items.name: fadeColor
items.desc: The color the header background will fade to, defined as a 3- to 8-character hexadecimal string or a color name string.Default value: #000000 (black)

items.name: type
items.desc: Always fading_sticky_header for this scene type.
